website_summaries.verdict: We love this plasma lighter for its good looks and impressive versatility. Features a powerful double beam and a more than adequate burn area.
pros: This reliable, well-built lighter eliminates the need for disposable butane models, making it far more environmentally friendly
Rechargeable with the included USB cable
cons: awkward to hold in a pocket

customer_reviews.title: Why do I have this again?
customer_reviews.text: I don't smoke, I don't really use candles, I'm not going to stumble into a Bear Grylls-esque survival situation where all I have is my trusty Saberlite Sparq and my naked backside to survive in Siberia. I'm a simple man. I see cool fire-starting tools, I buy fire-starting tools. The only reason I can see why I purchased this is to make a new product line of Cheez🔸It, the Extra Toasty Baby Swiss....
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works just right for me
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, I've been looking for some way of lighting my bowls without using any kind of flame and I finally found it. Would probably work great for other things like cigarettes or cigars. Heating element is fairly small, and seems to be holding up well so far. Battery seems to last a while, I charge it after heavy use so I haven't actually had it die on me. Definitely going to buy a few more of these for personal use and probably a couple more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. I looked through many different options before deciding on this lighter in particular. It seemed like a great product for a cigar smoker. My husband loved it the first couple of days, though he did say it didn't really light too practically in part due to size. Two days after receipt he went to use it and it no longer works. It has a charge and had been used minimally. I am super pissed. I cannot recommend this product and would like for the manufacturer to make this right for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Gio

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighter
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these type of lighters and this one would have to be my preferred because a) I can light a cigar with it in the wind, b) my buddy can light his pipe in the wind, and c) there is an off/on button that keeps the lighter from accidentally discharging/sparking in my pocket (this is the only one so equipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine until battery ran out.
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all, worked fine to light everything and anything including candles and the occasional cig. Problem started when it ran out of battery power (which didn't take too long, maybe 10-20 uses) I plugged it in for over 24 hours and the light never even came back on let alone was it able to light anything.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a windy environment. I keep my doors and windows open. Under these circumstances I don't often have an actual flame but when I do it can be hard to get something lit (birthday candles, advent candles and other occasional things do come up.) In addition, 4th of July is not a big fireworks event here but New Years Eve is, and lighting things outside is VERY difficult. Finally I have a lighter impervious to wind and damp air. I was tired of opening matches and finding them no longer effective and of lighters that blow out as fast as I can light them. I really enjoy this lighter!
customer_reviews.author: Farrah's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, not so good product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for a family member. They enjoyed the concept of it, and the fact it was rechargeable. However it proved to be cheaply designed. The lid is far beyond flimsy. It hangs on for dear life by the smallest of threads. I waited a few months to review as I wanted him to tell me how it performed. The lid eventually fell off, even when turned off and fully charged? It loses its charge and didnt last 7 hours before needing another charge. After three weeks he would need to hold his cigarettes closer to the point of touching the coils to get them to light. Was a thoughtful gift, just not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Have to switch it on seperately before you can use it
customer_reviews.text: This lighter 'feels' very cheaply made. The top rattles when it's closed. The biggest problem is the 're-thought', 're-design'. If I known it had a switch you had to activate to use it, I would have never purchased this item. It's so 'odd' that they would think of this. When you do switch it on, the light from the button is very bright and stays on, burning your battery.. Part of the 're-thought' I guess is to remove the safety out of the lid and put it on a switch on the bottom. This is a 're-engineered' disaster, and makes it very un usable since you can't pick it up and use it without turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kindred Wilborn

customer_reviews.title: Works with a small bowl bong.................
customer_reviews.text: PRO .....It works well when lighting bongs. I have a bong with a small metal cone bowl and it still is able to light what is in the bowl. I am pretty much touching the product with the head of the lighter. I had to get the technique down, but once I figured it out there was no problem. There seems to be less harshness in smoking and less heat as only the heat from the burning product is sucked into the bong. WHY FOUR STARS?......CON ....One drawback is the cap. The cap keeps flopping around when lighting so you have to work around it. I wish there was a way to control the flopping around cap.
customer_reviews.author: sinead

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lighter, but Lid Use Some Work
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lighter! Has a really nice safety feature which allows you to turn the light on and off using a switch to prevent accidental lighting. When at least decently charged can light anything with ease. Wind proof. Really cool looking! Has a lifetime warranty which I was pleasantly surprised with. Super nice customer service. Rechargeable which is super nice! Sturdy. Overall just a really great lighter and all my friends and family were extremely immpressed with it. Like I said though the only complaint I have is that the lid is kept close with a magnet which isn't cheaply made, but will break pretty easily. Amazing product though! I would definitely recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised however it is cylindrical and rolls around. If you leave the power button on, it drains the battery. The hinge on the cap is incredibly loose. Kind of a bummed out. Really wanted to like this. If they made the exact same lighting mechanism in a square or rectangle shape with a much tighter hinge for the lid it would be the best of this kind on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mando Commando

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, quality made, & long lasting charge!
customer_reviews.text: Hello everyone, Saberlight rechargeable I definitely highly recommend them! I've purchased these lighters because I live way off grid and driving more than 50 miles one way to get matches or a new lighter is not a happy thought. The performance of these rechargeable lighters has me almost lost for words. Great product totally exceeded my expectations! Great product for the kitchen and excellent for lighting the wood stove too. I've charged them fully on their arrival and they are still working well on the initial charge.
customer_reviews.author: Crane Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Great, a little heavy though
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a similar one I had (different brand) stopped charging after a few months. Quick shipping, came with charging cord, & comes all in a nice little box. So far, works great & convenient being able to use for multiple things. I like the fact that it has the blue light on front button so that you know whether it's on or not (and as a reminder to flip the switch to off). Only complaint, but minor, is the weight compared to regular lighters & even the previous similar one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: The lighter is awesome when its working but they dont last more then ...
customer_reviews.text: The lighter is awesome when its working but they dont last more then a week or two. I went through 2 of them, with the first one the charging port broke so I couldn't charge it so I returned it and bought another one hoping it would be better. But with the second one it was one of the arc towers that broke and fell off in a week and i had to return it. I am going to try another brand because these lighters are pretty awesome
customer_reviews.author: Mike Quartuccio

customer_reviews.title: Interesting device but doesn't replace good ole fire
customer_reviews.text: Smoking out of a bong this doesn't work very well. The plasma is too small to properly light all of your material, I ended up wasting quite a lot I think by thinking it was all smoked but seeing it wasn't ash made me realize this isn't working as efficiently as it should. when using actual fire, the flame lights the entire bowl and I get a nice even burn. this would be perfect for a cigar or cigarettes but not for a bowl. unless you have a very flat bowl any kind of depth to it will not allow the material at the bottom of your bowl to get lit.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: not my fav lighter
customer_reviews.text: The cap is not attached very well. You have to turn the light on with a switch on the butt-end before you can use it. It's TERRIBLE for lighting cigars or much of anything outside of the corner of a piece of paper. The battery drains even when it's turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel D. Self

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! 3 MONTHS WON'T CHARGE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Bought of 4/11/2018 it totally sux! No good anymore! As of 07/07/18 it stopped charging & is completely useless it will not charge whatsoever! A $16 paperweight is all I'm left with! Product should be removed from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Eliot

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend but we started well
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Color/style Works for man or woman. Worked perfectly. Cap moved all the way for cigars! Someone notes issues closing caps. Sometimes the magnet in the body of the lighter, sticks to the cap magnet. A dot of adhesive and good. The magnets work great. There is another set to keep the cap open 180°. But the usbmini port lasted about two charges. First time that ever happened to me. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BDUB

customer_reviews.title: Good for only lighting cigarettes!
customer_reviews.text: This is great only for cigarette lighting. If you're trying to light a pipe or a cigar with this, the burn Zone area is too small and will take you forever to try to get it around the whole end of your cigar to get it lit... the same for the area you need to cover with your pipe tobacco smoking from a pipe. But the burn Zone area circumference is great for if your lighting a cigarette!
customer_reviews.author: Trent Burton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for awhile, and waited to give it a final judgement. I would definitely buy it again. I love that I don't have to constantly recharge it (long battery life) or refill it (no fluids to mess with). I dislike that you have to make contact with the unit to ignite. This is not always very convenient. Overall, though - I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lighter for over a week now. The only flaw is that the one i got is not working complete, out of four nodes that light up, only two work strong but the other two are weak and don't produce enough heat hence the cross flame is half lit and half not so much, that's why it takes a long time to light up a cigarette and that means the charge will drain in half a day, it would have been a good lighter if all sides would have worked properly. This might be a defective one that i got. thinking about returning..
customer_reviews.author: Roya

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but has a few issues ...
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and pretty and appears to be well made and of good quality. I had a few problems. The on-off switch is small and at the bottom, and almost impossible to turn it on without a flashlight. When the lid is open, it covers the thumb button used to get a light. And finally, do not use it on a metal pot pipe cause when it touches the pipe, you sometimes get a shock in your mouth. Mine didn't hold a charge very long, but re-charges really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great product :)
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far arrived as described. Lid is a little loose and may inadvertently open if your not careful other than that is works great . The plasma has a strong current and the charge last very long looks great too. If you hold it upside down the plasma works fine. Very sleak design so be careful not to drop if hold upside down would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Pretty, BUT!!
customer_reviews.text: It will not win an award for lighting even a smaller ring cigar. It is not "Oklahoma Wind" proof. Other than being a novelty, I have found little use for it. I do find that it will not "torch" my whiskers, anyway. Maybe it will ignite my lighter fluid on charcoal when outdoor cooking. Might be a good "torture" device. Save your money and buy butane and good torch lighters. The torch lighters I have are "Oklahoma Wind" resistent and work well in rain. Looks Pretty
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Charge Port
customer_reviews.text: Received item July 22nd, 2017. Used maybe 2 days straight in between then and the unit Stopped charging August 7th, 2017. Now it's just a 20 dollar paperweight...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gourley

customer_reviews.title: junk ligher
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your money on this. Would give it zero stars if that was an option. This lighter worked in the beginning, but after a few short days, the plasma no longer came out of all four locations, and became essentially useless. Unfortunately, I was away from home traveling, so could not return within 30 days. Very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good. For the price. But far from great
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this for when I’m skiing. The arc adequately ignites whatever your trying to light. Wind proof. But it’s a little cumbersome. First you have to flick a switch on the bottom to turn it on then it lights up. Now open the flimsy cap and press the Illuminated button. The cap hinge feels as though it will fail. Also it should be able to double as a charger. Like a battery stick.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mc

customer_reviews.title: Super great lighter
customer_reviews.text: Super great lighter, bowl friendly. Only "complaint" kind of, but not really, is just be aware that this isn't silent. When it's on and you push the button to get the plasma going, it's makes a very strong high pitch ring/buzz. Other than that, works great! Scared of accidentally pushing the button with the lid closed while the switch is on since you shouldn't touch it to metal because it will source as a conductor of electricity and shock you. Definitely going to keep this and possibly more around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun and unique, but not better
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a mini cattle prod. For that reason, it's fun to zap people with...like my brother. As a lighter it's not as good as a typical Bic unless you're in a windy environment. It's nice to not have to refill it with butane, but you end up having to recharge it a lot more frequently, which gets annoying after a while. I use it to zap my brother and that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Speerdo

customer_reviews.title: Has Become My Go-To
customer_reviews.text: My ignition problems have been solved! If anything nearby needs to be on fire, I know that in my pocket lies the power to wield plasma, the ultimate destructive force. Does that paper need to be on fire? Got it! Is your cigarette sadly not lit? Bam! I got you covered. One bit of criticism in the spirit of fairness, if the was any way to expand the distance between so that the arcs were a wee bit longer, I believe it would be an improvement. Just in terms of speed of lighting a cigarette (personal experience). I'm getting one for my partner and will definitely be suggesting it to others! :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Quality/service
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this lighter. This would be my 1st purchase if this style lighter so I would not have anything to compare it to. The lighter does seem to be of good quality though. A nice bonus was recieving an email from the seller with an extended warranty of 1 year. Nice to know if I have any issues with it the company will stand by their product. Hopefully I will never need it.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: hard to turn all the way to on
customer_reviews.text: you really really really have to make sure the button on the botton is pushed as far to the on as possible or it won't work. i thought it was broken but kept turning off then on until it lit up and now i realize after several weeks of use that it's the button has to be pressed beyond what would be considered reasonable to get to the actual on position. but it works great once it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product love the finish
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift works great comes with a on/off switch so don't be worried that it might turn on accidentally in your pocket. Also came with a year warranty from the seller. Great for other things aswell like hard to reach candles or stove tops/heaters. I might just get one for myself and I'm not a smoker but it's handy.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Man

customer_reviews.title: Substitute for butane. Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product on cigarettes and pipes with success. I wanted to try something different from butane. It has definitely been a better experience with this lighter. The design and packaging is very good. I especially like the magnetic cap, as it will not be too susceptible to wear. The only thing I didn't like was the insulation on the wires that create the arcs. I was concerned about inhaling the fumes from it burning. But after breaking in it, it doesn't seem the insulation will burn any further. Overall, I'm very happy with this product and would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wald Rensing

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after use only a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product I used a a couple of times this past summer. I went to recharge it and it will no longer recharge. It is completely worthless te return window should be much longer in these products. The window is short because they know it will stop working after a while
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: novelty item, stick to traditional lighters
customer_reviews.text: Poor design, and it literally shocked you if you pressed the button too hard because of an electrical issue within the device. The device was likely defective, but when it did work it was more of a novelty type of item. I wouldn't recommend anyone using one of these as they burn inconsistently on anything larger than a cigarette.
customer_reviews.author: IATFalcon

customer_reviews.title: You have to be really close
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun product! It was smaller than I expected, regular lighter sized. Works well, has two little purple arcs you can see. The only downside is that you have to touch the top of the lighter to whatever you are lighting, so it puts your hand really close to the fire and you can't safely light anything with any kind of accelerant on it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDawn

customer_reviews.title: cool alternative to a tradtional lighter.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool and lives up to the expectations. my two cons are that it is a lot bigger than I thought so i won't be keeping it in my pocket on a day to day basis. Also the flip top tends to fall in place when you are trying to say light a candle. Takes a bit to get used to that so you hold it in a way that will light the candle without the top getting wax on it or blocking your path.
customer_reviews.author: gohan2021

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it would be exactly like a windproof lighter. Instead, it auto shuts-off after like 5 seconds, and it produces such a loud high-pitch sound that it is almost unusable if you not want to annoy anyone (yourself included). Save your money for another product, this is going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun NR

customer_reviews.title: No power!!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t as good as I thought. It just didn’t have the power that I thought it would. Good for the money but it doesn’t light a cigarette that good I had to keep pushing the button at least six or seven times before I can get the cigarette lit. Don’t have the power. And it keeps turning off as it only stays going for about 10 seconds and that’s push button again kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Got bang for the buck I keep mine in the box on my table untill I use it so have to say I'm pretty sure others caused it to malfunction for there dissatisfaction I'll update if anything changes but turn it off after every use very simple or the battery wears. Also don't use another charger for it. Nobody reads the manuel nowadays there's dos and donts it's 16 bucks don't expect it not to break first drop but I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a day so far, but works for what i needed. Melts nylon cord to seal it with little fuss and no burns or warping/bubbling. I do wish the charging lights were more clear. Came with no instructions, usage is simple to figure out but id like it more if it had a low batter and charging indicator that was color coded
customer_reviews.author: LongHairedHippie

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: meh. I've been a pretty big fan of the tesla coil at the Boston science museum for like twenty years so having a little personal one is pretty cool, but functionally it leaves something to be desired. I was hoping I could use it to heat up dab nails, but that won't work for several reasons. That's my fault though, it's just a little less usable than I was hoping for, but for fifteen bucks I'd probably have bought it even if I had known what i know now. I have lit a couple cigarettes with it though, and it hasn't broken yet. If it lasts a couple years it will save some money too.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Dont just buy 1....  buy 20!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought this as a gift and my buddy and I like the same things... So it's hard for us to keep 1-uping eachother... Well I received it in 2 days and right out the box it started right up. This little guy is bad ass! the sound alone is so. It doesnt have that loud torch sound. Or the loud snap pop like a tazer. I'm buying more of every color. . 1 concern is the quality of the lid... I think it would be the first part to go... But I love and want more
customer_reviews.author: The smosh

customer_reviews.title: Not a paid review. I received this today and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a paid review. I received this today and have used it twice. It is exactly what you get. Packaging: 10/10 Portability: 10/10 Aesthetic: 10/10 Effectiveness: 1010 Someone said in their review the light was a problem. The light for "Power on" is a blue ring around the power button. It's bright enough that it might be a problem for concealment for some. I put my thumb over it. Problem solved. If your thumb is small, put it in your palm. Or just turn it off on the bottom when you are done. The purpose of the light: -battery is being used -a mini light to see what isn't green anymore. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hart

customer_reviews.title: If Used for Cigars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to light many cigars. It takes about 30 seconds of turning the cigar and puffing to light each section of tobacco. You just have to have patience. In the top is a nice polished area that's mirror like so you can see if your totally lit. Not as quick as a torch lighter on a cigar but still nice to have. Especially nice if flying on airlines as it had no fluid. Some airlines ban lighters and some don't.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great when matches and other lighters don't when in the field.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lighter to light cigars while in the field in the desert with the Army and it works great. Don't have to worry about fuel, charge it from the generator, and sand won't clog it. I've literally cigars in some pretty high wind. It's a little more difficult to get an even light, but it'll light them when my matched won't. The high pitched noise is annoying but it's only when lighting. And as an added benefit I can use it to keep my LTs in line...
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Absolute garbage. Buyer beware! Broke after a few uses. Very cheap, takes forever to charge and doesn’t provide a sufficient spark unless fully charged, but it did work great for a few uses, then the charging cord fell apart. Then the usb charging port on the lighter missaligned itself in the unit and won’t take a charge. Don’t buy this brand ever go with a different electronic lighter, they work but bot this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Glidewell

customer_reviews.title: A Plasma Lighter That Works Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for producing a wonderful alternative to the butane lighter. This item is beautiful, sleek, functional and serves my purposes perfectly. The seller was quick to ship and a blessing to deal with. This transaction was one of the best I've had on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: William Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted. Sadly it did not last.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 32 days of infrequent use. Only had to charge it twice, so you can see how infrequent. Now it only sputters out a beam and can’t light paper. Of course too late to return. In my opinion it was not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Danp1121

customer_reviews.title: Requires you to find a tiny sharp edged switch on the bottom to operate every time.
customer_reviews.text: These arc lighters are amazing but this one requires you to find a tiny switch on the bottom to operate it every time. Difficult in the dark. Other brands you can pick up and operate immediately with one hand. This one takes fumbling. If you leave the switch on the bright led indicator will burn a hole in your eyes until the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: bb2012sg

customer_reviews.title: Lighting candles and melting shrink-tubing is insanely easy with this
customer_reviews.text: Lighting candles and melting shrink-tubing is insanely easy with this. I brought it to work and many people were immediately interested in buying one. It claims to have a lifetime warranty as well. It does produce an irritating high-pitched whine when being used that can actually hurt your ears after awhile (and drives animals crazy), but luckily whatever you're lighting gets lit almost instantly so it's never on very long.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Yancar

customer_reviews.title: Must have versatile EDC item.
customer_reviews.text: The lighter is used for trekking/hiking and any outdoor adventure and survival. Flints and steels, water proof matches, and etc. become back up equipment instead of primary fire starting gear. Coupled with a small solar charger for extended trips, there will be ample and dependable powerful fire starting capability.The design is more functional than most others of this type because the plasma beam is less obstructed by the structure of the lighter. The design allows for more versatility with positioning the lighter for use.
customer_reviews.author: David A. McIlroy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 3 days....
customer_reviews.text: Used it for lighting candles, cigs, whatever and then just stopped working out of nowhere. Tried cleaning it and it didn’t work. This device is cool but having used it you can tell it’s cheap and faulty kinda like an “As seen on TV” thing. This isn’t the real deal quality you want with a premium lighter purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: and I LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for an alternative to a normal lighter for a while, and I LOVE THIS THING! I've used it to light people's cigarettes, my candles, all sorts of things! I love that this has a "flat" area that can light things; it makes it more useful than the Zippo-looking models.
customer_reviews.author: SvenskaSpark

customer_reviews.title: Safe and convenient lighter.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on a cigar. Also, it's small size is appreciated. When I fly this electronic device is fine in carry-on whereas butane lighters present a hazard along with the refill device. In the past I resorted to the old fashion match which is really not efficient. Bob O'Malley USN [Ret.]
customer_reviews.author: Robert OMalley

customer_reviews.title: It will light a cigar.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for cigars and it works ok for that. It charged back up fast. I wish it had more of the electrodes on top for bigger lighting surface. (8 instead of 4). All in all does a good job in the wind. Lights my cigars but it is slower than matches. (Unless you have old or wet matches).
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: this gadget is completely useless spark is not big nor hot enough when using upside down lid closes on you. i am so depressed that i don't have energy to return it,the price is way to high this thing isn't worth anything
customer_reviews.author: iluminado

customer_reviews.title: Neat lighter but tricky at times to light smokes
customer_reviews.text: I like this handy lighter. I don't worry about losing my lighter or if it gets pocketed on accident by a friend anymore. The magnet for the lid still is holding strong. I dont try to carry it around much because its kinda heavy in your pocket and think it might mess up the lid/cap. works great for using at home.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Choice for Pipe Smokers
customer_reviews.text: Poor choice for pipe smokers. Tiny on-off switch. Only lights small part of pipe bowl: multiple clicks to light pipe completely. Hinged lid can scratch rim of bowl. Cylindrical shape and heavy weight make it clumsy for pocket carry. A gimmick that might work for a cigarette smoker. Best solution for pipe smoker is lidless butane lighter with adjustable "soft" jet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richard Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable, No double arcs.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it worked as expected until it died. We charged it for 2 hours then went to turn it on an only 1 arc was on. After having it on for about 6 seconds it automatically turned off. As if the batteries were dead. My over all opinion on this is dont waste 20 bucks on this it dosent do what it says it does. Therefor it gets 1 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: This thing shipped to me broken
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package it looked slightly worn not too bad but there was a notable sort of scratch mark like it had been dropped in the past, I tried to use it as the instructions state the button would glow blue when the lid was open but when pressed did not arc I tried to charge it figured it was not charged I used the cable provided in the package it did not light up or indicate it was charging so I took it off the charger after about 30 minutes and it still did not work I repeated this 2 times and it still does not work whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Stout

customer_reviews.title: Great for a business man
customer_reviews.text: Ok gang,here’s my opinion on the new sparq lighter I got ,,first and for most package arrived on time and in great shape out of the box it’s pretty simple and clean easy to use,but I’m still on the hunt for the perfect arch lighter ,,,this is a great lighter but I want an arch that ignites almost instantaneous an nice big solid dual arch that clears the houseing considerably for easy access to pipes light a cigar quickly not left holding a button for far to long,, thank you for a good product
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus 56

customer_reviews.title: Tiny on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it rechargeable. What I don't like is that the instructions tell you to turn it off when not in use. This is an inconvenience because the switch is on the bottom and so small it's difficult to switch on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool lighter that my son purchased. I like that you can travel with it, since there is no "fuel" involved and no fumes. He is going to try to use it on creme brulee. I will update you if it works!
customer_reviews.author: JBean

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: As described. Second one came in operating even better than the first, and the first one was on point. Ordered a second one because my first one disappeared. I suspect fowl play but without proof or a hint of who took it all I can donis buy another. Hope the theif of the first one is as happy as I was with it. This thing is awesome. Sets fire to flammables very fast just like straight up fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooler better flavor hits.
customer_reviews.text: Only had this product for a few days now. The first time I used the plasma lighter there is an immediate difference in the temperature. The hit was much cooler and the taste was stronger, cleaner and better flavor without butane. Very easy to use keep in one spot for a slow burn or move it around in your product to light a bigger surface. So I would say easier on your throat with better tasting product. No downsides.
customer_reviews.author: john cura

customer_reviews.title: Good product, quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: I started loving the product but at some point the magnet stopped working and now it won't close. This happened in under a week of having it. The product itself is great, I probably got a defective copy. I contacted the vendor and did not get any reply.
customer_reviews.author: jose emiliano covarrubias ameca

customer_reviews.title: Best damn lighter around
customer_reviews.text: Reason 1- your product lasts 5 times longer than traditional lighter that has overburn. Reason 2- no butain taste. Pure natural flavor. Reason 3- The sound annoys the dogs ( humans can barley hear it)
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Flame on!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little lighter. If you are a pipe or cigar smoker, then be warned this is not for you. Although it will work, it will take time.
customer_reviews.author: Txmmoore

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a go bag and it is really useful. The only draw back is that it has to be charged and the item has to be touching the electricity to light. It not like a flame where the item can be a half inch away from flame.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea, design, and lifetime warranty. I don't like how sometimes the arc will angle down, below the points, which would make lighting some items difficult. Luckily I light candles so the wick can easily be placed in the center even when the plasma arcs dip down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryh

customer_reviews.title: Where's the top safety feature?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I realized (unlike the Sparq XL) there is no safety inside the top cap so that it doesn't accidentally trigger if the device is left switched on and the blue button is pressed. So if someone happens to forget to turn this off and put this in their pocket it could potentially be dangerous. I'd recommend everyone to be careful. Its a serious flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Zena Pavlik

customer_reviews.title: The lid doubles the width when it is opened
customer_reviews.text: So this is really cool, but if you want to light a candle with it the candle has to be huge. Once you flip the lid on the top the width doubles which I didn’t think about when ordering. All my smaller candles I still need to use a lighter or a match with. This is nice to take camping though.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Trottier

customer_reviews.title: Qualty product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiancè. Mostly thinking it would be a neat little novelty for lighting her candles. We were both surprised by how well it works. It truly is wind proof in any realistic circumstance. Its very well designed and the construction is well done. I wasnt aware when i ordered it also comes with a year warranty. I recommend this to any candle lover, smoker who would like to avoid inhaling butane each time they smoke, or anyone who has a wanting for a lighter you never need to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended as a good cigar torch
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended as a good cigar torch...so far, I'm not convinced. It struggled to get a cigar lit. The plasma does not extend far enough out to hit the tobacco. You really need to hold it in place for 30 seconds to get the cigar to glow a bit, then puff away, hoping the ember grows. I'll stick with a flame for now, but will keep this as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: M Lupiano

customer_reviews.title: The future is now!
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye dirty butane and matchstick sulfur for igniting my pipe tobacco, hello instead to the most futuristic and absolutely sick device that launches two crisscross powerful Tesla purple electrical arcs out in order to cleanly ignite your favorite smoke. The bright blue LEDs and the blazing white welding like ignition spark is also really cool. No more worries about wind while out on the patio, and the usb charging works well to charge up the battery for your next sesh.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn J.

customer_reviews.title: It lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for 2 years now and hardly use it because I have no need for it. Just wanted it because it looked cool. It still works just fine after using it for all sorts of fireworks and things that explode. It's gotten very dirty and it's been through a lot in a short amount of time and then sat for a year. It still works great tho. Lasts forever too, never needed an actual lighter for the past 2 years. 100% recommend for people who buy lighters all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: High pitch sound
customer_reviews.text: Works well. But my problem with it is that it emits a high-pitched tone. I personally cannot hear it and it does not bother me in the slightest. But I have a few friends and family members but absolutely do not want to be anywhere around when I'm using that lighter
customer_reviews.author: Stevo N

customer_reviews.title: Cool lighter - works as intended but cap/lid won't close
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lighter, use it for cigars. Don't expect to be able to close the lid/cap all the way though once you open it. It'll close about 75% but not all the way. Maybe mine is just defected, it still works as intended though and is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a butane lighter. Pros It looks cool Cons Doesn't light cigars well Doesn't light incense well Doesn't light cigarillos well Can't use it to melt fishing knot ends Failed after a month and will not charge Switching back to a butane torch
customer_reviews.author: ljfromnj

customer_reviews.title: Bum Lighter
customer_reviews.text: At the end of February 2018 I purchased the triple beam version of this lighter. By May it would no longer take a charge. I love the idea of a travel-safe lighter, so I thought perhaps the double beam, being simpler, might last longer, and ordered one at the end of July. So now I’m sitting down in Mexico bumming matches from the locals, because this one is no-cigar as well. Great concept, sleek look, terrible performance.
customer_reviews.author: mark vandruff

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my favorite feature is that it is rechargeable! It was stolen from me, which I’m sad about, but not surprised about, this thing was awesome. I instantly bought a second!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Lil tink~tink
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ironworker. Trying to light up a smoke in the wind is a pain in the ass up on the iron. I bought this, took it with me to work, dropped in from 80 ft up first thing in the morning.... Needless to say it said tink tink off the beams and smoked the concrete below! Come break I found it, picked it up, checked it and it still worked unscaved!! Lit me up a smoke and carried on with my day proud as ever bragging about it. I give this thing a proud 5 stars and engraved " Lil tink~tink" on the side haha!
customer_reviews.author: Brian workman

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK-
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool concept, yet it worked for about a week then didn't hold a charge. I had ordered other ones and was happy, then realized the return window passed, so if you buy this... return it time. The single saber lighter is 100 % BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: renlangi

customer_reviews.title: Ok LIghter...Works; updated on after 4 months use
customer_reviews.text: Added items 3, 4, and 5 on Jan 21, 2019 (after 4 months of use). Reducing the rating to 1 as it not worth the price Likes - 1) On time Delivery 2) lights cigarettes in wind and works; dislikes - 1) ease of use - 2 buttons to turn on, placed far apart 2) Battery runs out quickly; Needs recharge after about 15 lights 3) It's been 4 months and battery does not hold charge 4) Electrodes not hold charge anymore; electrodes to fire as they used to 5) Covering of the 2 electrodes came off
customer_reviews.author: Alpesh P.

customer_reviews.title: It looks so expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a really beautiful lighter (it looks so expensive), it works extremely well. It is so nice that I am going to have it engraved. Thanks for such a nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need to light up in a Tornado, you'll need this.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one within an hour. The second one works. It's a novelty. Purple electricity zaps 4 leads and makes fire. Good for lighting in the wind and the USB power is nice. No more running out of butane
customer_reviews.author: BenZoh

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZZARD!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in with included charging cable after opening. It immediately started smoking. I unplugged it right away and had to take it outside because of it getting hotter by the second and releasing smoke and nauseous fumes. Be very careful where you leave this!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Saxon

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase I’ve Made In a While
customer_reviews.text: Best lighter I ever purchased and It’s the conversation at all my parties. Perfect for Cigars, Pipes, Pretty much whatever. This little baby does the job! I highly recommend and I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: I can light a bowl with it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be able to stop using Butane lighters. It has worked well in the first week of use and I hope it will continue to. It is also pretty neat to be able to light something in a howling wind.
customer_reviews.author: Johnm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Feeling like I over paid, it feels like chineese factory crap, works as it should but clearly cheap materials and manufacturing, battery doesn't last too long either. Just irritated how wobbly the top cap is.
customer_reviews.author: josue

customer_reviews.title: LAME
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing more than a tiny taser or stun lighter, it is a silly and ridiculous excuse for a lighter by any means. It doesn't put out nearly enough heat to properly ignite most dried and smoke-able materials. It is a weak lighter and it functions fine as a taser.
customer_reviews.author: Linda MacDermott

customer_reviews.title: Needs a "sleep" mode
customer_reviews.text: cool plasma lighter wish it had a sleep mode so you didn't have to turn it on every time you use it ! yes you have to turn on tiny on/off switch every time you use it but cool otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Winks ESQ

customer_reviews.title: Light your bowls upside down!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect. Super heavy duty and rechargeable. I needed a wind resistant camping lighter for my pipe. It takes a little getting used to but I do appreciate the magnetic lid. You just point and shoot where you wanna light up. Exceeds expectations. Sounds like an alien weapon, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: kam y.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! I just received it yesterday
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I just received it yesterday, tried it out on my cigar, I love it. What is nice about it especially for cigars, you have to rotate your cigar, which is what your supposed to do. All I have to do is make sure its charged, no biggie, it only takes an hour.
customer_reviews.author: HEET

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed I thought I was gonna be able to give ...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed I thought I was gonna be able to give a really good gift to someone and when it got here I tried to check if it worked. I did as the instructions said I even charged it first and the blue center light wouldn't turn on and it won't light at all. I am going to order another and hopefully this time it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lighter. I was given one as a gift and it never worked. I bought a second as I thought the first was just defective and that didn't work either. If you are looking to light a cigar I would avoid this lighter. Treat yourself to a triple flame lighter instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied 👍
customer_reviews.text: Cool little lighter, seems to light cigarettes just fine but may take some finesse to light something like a cigar. I have not tried it with a pipe yet. Works great if you keep the contacts clean, (I'd suggest doing that before you operate with the switch in the off position of course) performance of the battery seems to last a while granted that you can refrain from activating it just to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Few faults but overall good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to lighter. I’m a huge fan. I give it four stars for two reasons. Firstly, the cap broke off after about two weeks. But I found that it could reach the bottom of bowls better with the cap so I didn’t bother fixing or returning it. Secondly, it doesn’t have any indication of how charged it is, which would be useful. Other than that, I think this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
